FuncDef: The reset dhcpv6-access statistic command deletes statistics about online DHCPv6 users.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The reset dhcpv6-access statistic command is used when you want to learn about the statistics about online DHCPv6 users within a specified time period.
Configuration Impact
The reset dhcpv6-access statistic command deletes statistics about online DHCPv6 users. Use the display dhcpv6-access statistic command to view statistics about online DHCPv6 users within the specified time period.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
After using the reset dhcpv6-access statistic command, you cannot restore the statistics about online DHCPv6 users. Therefore, use this command with caution.
